description: Numbers n such that 2^(n-1) + n is prime.
comments: No other terms below 300000. - _Giovanni Resta_, Nov 12 2012a(8) > 500000. - Robert Price, May 24 2014
references: J.-M. De Koninck, Ces nombres qui nous fascinent, Entry 237, p. 66, Ellipses, Paris 2008.
links: K. S. Brown, The Sum of the Prime Factors of N. MathPages.com
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), May 02 2001
extensions: H. Zeisel found the probable prime 1885. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 03 2002
New term 51381 from Nuutti Kuosa (see MathPages link). - _Max Alekseyev_, Feb 08 2009
Deleted an incorrect conjecture. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 27 2009
